Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants
public class Game extends Object implements Constants
Game Class Creates the players, board and the referee objects for the tic-tac-toe game.
Author:
bains

    • create_player

      public static Player create_player(String name, char mark, Board board, BufferedReader stdin) throws IOException
      Creates the specified type of player indicated by the user.
      Parameters:
      name - player's name
      mark - player's mark (X or O)
      board - refers to the game board
      stdin - refers to an input stream
